Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The price of $7,000,000 is below replacement costs for this type of facility. The zoning allows for multiple uses and the site offers additional expansion and development potential. See brochure for more details.

CBRE Limited has been retained on an exclusive basis to coordinate the sale of 24 Stavanger Drive, a ±127,500 SF single storey commercial building centrally located in St. John’s, NL. 87,500 SF vacant, with a call centre operating in 40,000 SF, the facility has over 650 surface parking stalls, loading facilities and a partial basement. 24 Stavanger Drive is a high-profile site with significant visibility in the Stavanger Shopping Area. Zoned C2 Limited Commercial, the property can accommodate a wide range of retail, office, and general commercial uses.

The Stavanger unenclosed commercial center remains the strongest multi-use site in the Province. With the announcement 2019 that Exxon Mobil will be relocating to Hebron Way, we expect that a number of oil and gas occupiers will follow suit. This trend will further solidify the Stavanger Drive area and its importance to the Newfoundland & Labrador real estate market. The subject site features approximately 1 acre of improved and serviced land with a 14,732 square foot building. This asset represents a prime redevelopment opportunity in the east end market, with numerous scenarios that would yield above average returns for an owner occupier, or investor.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: EAST SIDE OF SITE LOOKING SOUTH ALONG TORBAY ROAD

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 24 Carr Crescent is one of the few larger format warehouse facilities in the community of Gander. The tenant, Western Wholesale Limited, is a division of the Coleman’s Group of Companies and uses this facility to distribute food and retail goods throughout the area. Coleman’s includes twelve food, four furniture and two retail clothing operations throughout Newfoundland. Colemans is the largest fully integrated independent wholesale/retail food operation in Atlantic Canada. The property is located in the Carr Crescent Industrial Park and is self managed by the tenant. Gander is the largest community in Northeastern Newfoundland with a current population of 12,000. It serves as the major retail and service centre for the area and includes the regional hospital (James Paton Memorial Health Centre). The town is serviced by an international airport. See Flyer for more details!
